title: 100 Club
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309134044im_/http:/typophile.com/files/03d6ede4cf79a18762e4864a4740ae48_4268.10661.jpeg)

Trying to identify this font but having real issues.

Would be forever grateful If anyone's got any ideas â€“ will save me the misery of redrawing the whole thing from scratch!

Thanks
author: misterblix

comments.content:
You could get close with [Garage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309134044/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/garage-gothic/). All you'd need to do is close the C some more.

Still looking for a better match.

- Mike Yanega

Some of the H&FJ [Knockout](http://web.archive.org/web/20100309134044/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100013) fonts (like No.47) would be close, but you would need to modify the '1'.

- Mike Yanega
What about House Gothic (though the 1 doesn't match either) ?
